sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --libexecdir=/opt/gnome2/sbin : This switch puts libexec files in /opt/gnome2/sbin instead of /opt/gnome2/libexec.
--sysconfdir=/etc/gnome : This switch puts configuration files in /etc/gnome instead of /opt/gnome2/etc.
--enable-gtk-doc : This switch will rebuild the documentation during the make command.
